suspects.name: Marcus O'Connell
suspects.personality: Jumpy and easily flustered, but beneath the surface, there's a deep-seated resentment and a sense of territoriality over his perceived duties.

physical_description.face: weathered face with tired eyes and a perpetually worried expression
physical_description.hair: short-cropped brown hair, slightly thinning at the crown
physical_description.distinctive_features: a faint, jagged scar above his right eyebrow, always nervously adjusting his collar

suspects.clue_object: A worn, dog-eared copy of the company's internal 'Employee Conduct Policy' manual, clutched tightly in his hand.
suspects.secret_motivation: Believed Dr. Thorne was exposing company secrets or violating critical protocols, undermining the security he felt responsible for. He saw himself as protecting the company from internal threats.
suspects.alibi: Claims he was doing his routine security rounds, found the body in the Innovation Lab, and immediately called for assistance.

suspects.name: Maya Sharma
suspects.personality: Brilliant and intensely focused, often perceived as aloof. She values intellectual challenge above all else and harbors a quiet disdain for inefficiency.

physical_description.face: sharp features with intense, analytical dark eyes and a often-frowning brow
physical_description.hair: long black hair tied in a messy, functional bun
physical_description.distinctive_features: a subtle, almost imperceptible tremor in her left hand when stressed, rarely makes eye contact

suspects.clue_object: A high-precision stylus pen, twirling restlessly between her fingers as if debugging a complex problem.
suspects.secret_motivation: Discovered Dr. Thorne was taking credit for her crucial algorithmic breakthroughs and was about to present them as his own at an upcoming conference, threatening her career advancement.
suspects.alibi: Was working remotely on a critical bug fix for a different project, claims to have been online the entire evening, collaborating with an overseas colleague via video call.

suspects.name: Liam Chen
suspects.personality: Reserved and detail-oriented, with a perfectionist streak. He's passionate about the physical manifestation of technology and feels undervalued compared to the software team.

physical_description.face: serious expression with a perpetually furrowed brow, often peering over his glasses
physical_description.hair: neatly styled, short light brown hair
physical_description.distinctive_features: oil stains on his fingertips despite apparent cleanliness, often adjusts his thick-rimmed glasses

suspects.clue_object: A small, specialized torque wrench, which he absently clicks open and shut, its metallic sound barely audible.
suspects.secret_motivation: Was fiercely protective of his robotic arm prototypes and suspected Dr. Thorne was recklessly pushing experimental limits, jeopardizing the integrity of his designs and his professional reputation.
suspects.alibi: Was in the workshop, located on a different floor, performing emergency maintenance on another prototype that had a power surge during the storm, has timestamped log entries from equipment diagnostics.

suspects.name: Chloe Davis
suspects.personality: Energetic and outwardly optimistic, but deeply pragmatic and financially driven. She prioritizes project deadlines and budget adherence above creative whims.

physical_description.face: expressive face with a quick, nervous smile that doesn't quite reach her eyes
physical_description.distinctive_features: always wears a high-end smartwatch and several intricate silver rings on her right hand

suspects.clue_object: A small, elaborately designed stress ball in the shape of a gear, which she squeezes rhythmically, almost unconsciously.
suspects.secret_motivation: Discovered Dr. Thorne was secretly diverting significant project funds for highly speculative personal research, threatening to derail a critical company initiative and expose her lax oversight to investors.
suspects.alibi: Claims she was at a late-night video conference call with overseas investors, though her connection was reportedly spotty due to the severe storm.
